import AnimatedLetter from '../AnimatedLetter' import './index.scss' import Loader from 'react-loaders' import { useEffect, useRef, useState } from 'react' import emailjs from '@emailjs/browser' const Contact = () => { const [letterClass, setLetterClass] = useState('text-animate') const refForm = useRef() useEffect(() => { setTimeout(() => { return setLetterClass('text-animate-hover') }, 4000) }, []) const sendEmail = (e) => { e.preventDfault() emailjs.sendForm( 'gmail', 'template_q3o7for', refForm.current, 'nSVWmOYQKaPR5rMkNGxBu').then( () => { alert('SUCCESS!') window.location.reload(false) }, () => { alert('FAILED...') } ); } return ( <>

I am interested in freelence opportunities - especially ambitious or large projects. However, if you have other request or question , don't hesitate t contact me using below form either.

) } export default Contact
